example.name: beam-grace
example.description: Demonstration of how grace notes interact with <beam> elements. The first subexample shows how to place a gracenote inside of a grouping of beamed regular notes. The second subexample shows how beamed grace notes are represented within a group of regular notes.

file.name: gbeam.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: gbeam.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
